name: Eszopiclone
description: Eszopiclone, also known by the brand name Lunesta, is a potent medication for the treatment of insomnia. The FDA has approved this medication for nightly use for up to 6 months, making it a popular choice for chronic insomnia sufferers.

name: Zolpidem
description: Zolpidem, sold under the brand name Ambien, is a sedative primarily used for the treatment of insomnia. It works by slowing brain activity to allow sleep.

name: Diazepam
description: Diazepam, commonly known as Valium, is a benzodiazepine that is used to treat anxiety, muscle spasms, and seizures.

name: Alprazolam
description: Alprazolam, known by the brand Xanax, is a fast-acting tranquilizer used to manage anxiety disorders and panic disorders.

name: Clonazepam
description: Clonazepam, sold under the brand Klonopin, is a medication used to prevent and treat seizures and panic disorders.

name: Lorazepam
description: Lorazepam, also known as Ativan, is a benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety disorders and sleep problems.

name: Temazepam
description: Temazepam, sold under the brand Restoril, is a medication used to treat insomnia by promoting sleep.

name: Triazolam
description: Triazolam, marketed under the brand Halcion, is a sedative used to treat severe insomnia.

name: Flurazepam
description: Flurazepam, known as Dalmane, is a medication used to treat insomnia and improve sleep quality.

name: Ramelteon
description: Ramelteon, sold under the brand Rozerem, is a non-benzodiazepine medication used to help people fall asleep more easily.

name: Lorazep
description: Lorazepam, also known as Ativan, is a benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety disorders and sleep problems.

name: Temaze
description: Temazepam, sold under the brand Restoril, is a medication used to treat insomnia by promoting sleep.
